Summary: Five balloon like structures with flames inside hovered then took off quickly way into the atmosphere.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Slidell
There were no other sightings in Slidell on or around December 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsFive balloon like structures with flames inside hovered over lakeview drive in New Orleans tonight. We were driving and caught it out of the corner of our eyes. We thought they were paper lanterns but they truly ascended with such speed we were freaked out. It looked liked it had fire inside it. We were mystified. They went out of sight quickly.
